root.name: triangle()
root.description: A triangle is a plane created by connecting three points. The first two arguments specify the first point, the middle two arguments specify the second point, and the last two arguments specify the third point.

parameter.label: x1
parameter.description: int or float: x-coordinate of the first point

parameter.label: y1
parameter.description: int or float: y-coordinate of the first point

parameter.label: x2
parameter.description: int or float: x-coordinate of the second point

parameter.label: y2
parameter.description: int or float: y-coordinate of the second point

parameter.label: x3
parameter.description: int or float: x-coordinate of the third point

parameter.label: y3
parameter.description: int or float: y-coordinate of the third point
